title: Cincinnati Chili II
directions: In a 4 quart saucepan over medium heat, cook ground beef, green pepper, onion, chili powder and garlic, until beef is browned and vegetables are tender.  Drain  fat off of beef/vegetable mixture.
Add undrained kidney beans, tomato soup, vinegar and cinnamon to soup, and bring to a boil.  Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Heat through.
Serve with sprinkled cheese on top.
